name: Wolfbox
description:
Wolfbox is about a boy lost in a boxed jungle where every night shadow wolves appear. He used an empty cave as shelter from the shadow wolves and lit a bonfire every night. The boy needs to gather resources around the cave such as food and firewood to survive each and everyday. Gathering firewood is essential to this game for it keeps the bonfire lit and kills the shadow wolves who comes near it.

Enjoy!~

--
This game was created in Global Game Jam 2019
